title: Surpass It!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Umi, Kanan! The hell triathlon that you two created was awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You tried it? That makes me happy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Hearing you say that gives me reassurance that it was worth making.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>But.... Lanzhu wants to try something way, way tougher!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Even tougher than the triathlon? Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Kanan.... Let us grant Lanzhu’s wish. We shall create a training plan that will surpass the hell triathlon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re right. Now that we’ve done plenty of it, maybe it’s time to aim higher.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Leave it to us, Lanzhu. I’ll show you what we can make!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Lanzhu can’t wait for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
